item.title: 奥斯汀大规模建房，房租从峰值暴跌 22
item.description:
一位租户免费租用两个月，签订租约可获得600美元的优惠

【原文：

One tenant got two months free, $600 credit for signing lease as deals abound

】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员认为继续采取限制性政策是安全的
item.description: 根据欧洲中央银行 1 月份会议的描述，该行官员有信心继续将其货币政策设定描述为对经济的抑制。【原文：European Central Bank officials were confident in continuing to describe their monetary-policy settings as restraining the economy, according to an account of their January meeting.】

item.title: 降息为经济注入动力，土耳其即将走出衰退
item.description: 土耳其很可能在第四季度摆脱了技术性衰退，这支持了分析师对土耳其今年在央行降息周期的帮助下实现更强劲增长的预期。【原文：Turkey likely emerged from a technical recession in the fourth quarter, supporting analysts’ expectations of stronger growth this year, aided by a cycle of interest-rate cuts from the central bank.】

item.title: 比特币储备法案在各国接连失败
item.description: 虽然今年早些时候推动州政府以某种方式持有数字资产的呼声很高，但上个月有四个州的加密货币储备法案以失败告终。【原文：While the push for state governments to hold digital assets in one way or another generated momentum earlier this year, crypto reserve bills in four states have failed over the last month.】

item.title: 阿波罗的斯洛克警告说，一个更加分化的世界将引发通货膨胀
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）的托斯滕-斯洛克（Torsten Slok）认为，从全球化走向更加分散的世界，很可能会导致各地区的通货膨胀率长期走高。【原文：The move away from globalization toward a more fragmented world is likely to fuel permanently higher inflation across regions, according to Apollo Global Management’s Torsten Slok.】

item.title: 据称金达尔将把对意大利钢铁制造商的收购价提高至 40 亿欧元
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，金达尔钢铁公司将其对一家陷入困境的意大利钢铁制造商的收购报价提高至约 40 亿欧元（42 亿美元），试图击败来自阿塞拜疆的竞争对手。【原文：Jindal Steel raised its offer for a troubled Italian steelmaker to about €4 billion ($4.2 billion), seeking to outbid rivals from Azerbaijan, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 拆分英国石油公司将危及其有利可图的交易优势
item.description:
在过去五年中，这些业务为公司的资本回报率带来了约 4% 的平均提升。【原文：

Those operations delivered an average uplift of about 4% to the company’s return on capital during the past five years.

】

item.title: 阿曼航运公司可能定价最高，融资 3.33 亿美元
item.description: 一家由阿曼主权财富基金支持的物流集团可能会将其航运部门的上市定价定在最高点，筹集 1.281 亿里亚尔（约合 3.327 亿美元）的资金。【原文：A logistics group backed by Oman’s sovereign wealth fund is likely to price its shipping unit’s listing at the top of the range, raising 128.1 million riyals ($332.7 million).】

item.title: 腾讯发布 Turbo AI 模型，称其速度超过 DeepSeek
item.description: 腾讯控股有限公司（Tencent Holdings Ltd.）也加入了与 DeepSeek 竞争的公司行列，吹嘘其最新人工智能模型的速度有多快。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. joined the ranks of companies measuring themselves against DeepSeek by touting how much faster its latest AI model is.】

item.title: 安哥拉颁布法令，可能通过欧洲债券筹集多达30亿美元资金
item.description: 安哥拉财政部长已获准通过欧元债券融资多达30亿美元，通过出售日元债券融资最多10亿美元，为该国2025年支出计划提供资金。【原文：Angola’s finance minister has received approval to raise as much as $3 billion in eurobonds and at most $1 billion through the sale of yen-denominated bonds to fund the country’s 2025 spending plan.】

item.title: 中央银行鹰派政策推动兹罗提飙升至 10 年高点
item.description: 兹罗提对欧元的汇率飙升至十年来的最高水平，令出口商和波兰政府感到震惊，升值加剧了对中央银行紧缩利率政策的担忧。【原文：The zloty surged to the highest level against the euro in a decade, alarming exporters and the Polish government, with the appreciation exacerbating concerns over the central bank’s tight interest rate policy.】

item.title: 劳斯莱斯首席执行官将公司的 "燃烧平台 "推向新高度
item.description: 在担任劳斯莱斯控股公司（Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc）首席执行官的两年时间里，Tufan Erginbilgic 将这家曾被他讥讽为 "燃烧的平台 "的公司变成了振兴奄奄一息的工业偶像的案例研究。【原文：In his two years as chief executive officer of Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc, Tufan Erginbilgic has turned the company he once derided as a “burning platform” into a case study for reviving a moribund industrial icon.】

item.title: 2025 年伊始，巴西失业率增幅低于预期
item.description: 今年年初，巴西失业率的增幅低于预期，这是拉丁美洲最大经济体的劳动力市场正在经受借贷成本上升考验的最新迹象。【原文：Brazil’s unemployment rate rose less than expected at the start of the year, the latest sign that the labor market in Latin America’s largest economy is weathering higher borrowing costs.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克就前推特员工离职问题进行的代价高昂、效率低下的斗争
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）将报道埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）为避免向被解雇的 Twitter 员工支付遣散费而进行的斗争。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kurt Wagner reports on Elon Musk’s battle to avoid severance payments to fired Twitter employees.】

item.title: 人工智能交易停滞不前，英伟达和Salesforce令多头望而却步
item.description: 投资者希望英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的财报能重振人工智能行业，但他们并没有得到他们想要的报告。【原文：Investors hoping that Nvidia Corp.’s earnings would rejuvenate the artificial intelligence trade didn’t exactly get the report they wanted.】

item.title: 邮轮需求旺盛抵消成本上升，挪威邮轮公司业绩上升
item.description: 挪威邮轮控股有限公司（Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd.）表示，尽管由于成本上升，其初步利润展望未达预期，但预计今年的邮轮需求将继续保持强劲。【原文：Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd. signaled strong cruise demand is expected to continue this year, though its initial profit outlook missed expectations on higher costs.】

item.description: 我是驻纽约的美国经济记者奥古斯塔-萨拉瓦。今天，我们关注美国的通货膨胀。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Augusta Saraiva, a US economy reporter in New York. item.title: 纳瓦罗称特朗普对推出关税的态度 "相当明确
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）让世界各地的投资者和贸易官员挠头不已，不知道他威胁的关税何时生效，范围有多大。他的一位高级贸易顾问不同意这种说法，认为这增加了困惑。【原文：President Donald Trump left investors and trade officials around the world scratching their heads about when his threatened tariffs will take effect and how broad they’ll be. One of his top trade advisers disagreed that there was added confusion.】

item.title: 大资金重新涌向 2008 年破产的杠杆交易
item.description: 在 2008 年金融危机爆发十多年后，一种旨在通过杠杆作用提高收益的多元化投资策略又受到了大资金经理们的青睐。【原文：A diversified investment strategy that seeks to juice returns through leverage is finding new love among big money managers — more than a decade after it blew up during the 2008 financial crisis.】

item.title: 英国统计学家将就延长罢工投票
item.description: 从华尔街到伦敦金融城，白领们都面临着重返办公室的新压力，而英国的一个官僚团体却加倍努力，争取继续在家办公。【原文：As white-collar workers from Wall Street to the City of London face new pressure to return to the office, one group of British bureaucrats has doubled down in its battle to continue working from home.】

item.title: 欧尔班减税政策受挫，匈牙利将再次错失欧盟预算目标
item.description: 上周末，匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）宣布了选举前的减税措施，此后，匈牙利又面临着一系列预算目标未能实现的问题。【原文：Hungary is facing the latest in a series of missed budget targets after the announcement of pre-election tax breaks by Prime Minister Viktor Orban last weekend.】

item.title: 刚果在停止钴出口后将实施手工钴垄断
item.description: 刚果民主共和国正在开始实施一项计划已久的国家垄断措施，以控制手工开采的钴的生产，扩大其通过利用该国对全球供应的主导地位来提高电池金属价格的努力。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo is starting to enforce a long-planned state monopoly to control production of hand-dug cobalt, broadening its efforts to boost prices for the battery metal by leveraging the country’s dominance over global supplies.】

item.title: 南非私人投资公司将非洲私人信贷视为机遇
item.description: 南非最大的资金管理公司将私人信贷视为非洲的一个增长机会，因为该公司寻求在本土市场之外实现多元化。【原文：South Africa’s biggest money manager sees private credit as a growth opportunity in Africa as it seeks to diversify outside of its home market.】

item.title: 投资反弹照亮波兰 2025 年经济前景
item.description: 波兰的经济前景因 2024 年末投资反弹的数据而得到提振，这表明该国 2025 年的经济增长除消费外可能还有另一个引擎。【原文：Poland’s economic prospects were boosted by data showing that investments rebounded in late 2024, suggesting that the country’s growth in 2025 may have another engine besides consumption.】

item.title: 自动化仓库推广放缓，Ocado 将裁员 500 人
item.description: Ocado Group Plc 将裁员约 500 人，约占其全球员工总数的 2.5%，因为其自动化杂货仓库业务的前景充满挑战。【原文：Ocado Group Plc will cut about 500 jobs, or about 2.5% of its global workforce, as it faces a challenging outlook for its automated grocery warehouse business.】

item.title: 美国国债下跌，交易商等待 GDP 数据释放增长信号
item.description: 交易员们在等待美国的经济数据，以寻找经济增长放缓的进一步迹象。【原文：Treasuries slipped as traders awaited economic data from the US for further signs that growth is flagging.】

item.title: 法拉利股权出售推动欧洲大宗交易创 20 年新高
item.description: 阿涅利家族出售了法拉利公司 30 亿欧元（31.4 亿美元）的股份，推动欧洲整车销售创下二十年来最强劲的开局。【原文：The Agnelli family’s disposal of a €3 billion ($3.14 billion) stake in Ferrari NV has propelled European block sales to the strongest start to the year in two decades.】

item.title: 美国抢购供应，主要鸡蛋运输国土耳其将对出口征税
item.description: 土耳其是世界上最大的鸡蛋运输国之一，在禽流感爆发挤压全球市场供应的情况下，土耳其开始征收出口税，以帮助控制国内价格。【原文：Turkey — one of the world’s biggest egg shippers — introduced a tax on exports to help control domestic prices, as bird flu outbreaks squeeze supply on the global market.】

item.title: 资本市场走强，加拿大帝国商业银行利润超出预期
item.description: 加拿大帝国商业银行（Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce）的业绩超出了分析师的预期，所有业务部门都取得了增长，尤其是资本市场业务表现强劲。【原文：Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce came ahead of analyst expectations with gains across all segments, particularly with strength in the capital markets business.】

item.title: 游说者敦促美国制裁犯错的南非官员
item.description: 自称代表南非白人利益的南非游说团体敦促特朗普政府谴责卷入国家贪污司法调查的南非最大政党的高级成员。【原文：South African lobby groups who say they represent the interests of White Afrikaners urged the Trump administration to censure senior members of the nation’s biggest political party implicated in a judicial probe into state graft.】
